title: Kandangi Kandangi Lyrics Jilla Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song:  Kandangi Kandangi
Singer : Vijay, Shreya Ghosal
Movie : Jilla
Music: D Imman
Lyrics: Vairamuthu
click here for lyrics in Tamil
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Kandangi Kandangi katti vandha ponnu
kandaale kirukethum kanja vacha kannu
Andha kannuku, anji latchan thaaren de
andha nejuku, sothezhudhi thaaren de
mutham thariyaa.. oh oo h...

Kandangi Kandangi katti vandha ponnu
kandaale kirukethum kanja  vacha kannu
indha kannuku anji latchan podhaadhu..
indha nenjukku sothezhudhi theeraadhu.
thalli nillaiyaa ... oh..oh.

Adi un veedu thallaa kuzham
en veedu theppa kuzham
neerodu neeru serattumey.

Azhagaa malakoyil yaana vandhu
alvaaava thinbadhu pol
en aasa unna thinnatumey.

Othaiku oththa alaikkum azhagu
otha pakkam odhungum pozhudhu
butthikulla adikudhu
neththikulla thudikudhu.

Vella mudi veliya theriya
kalla muli mulikkum pozhudhu.
en usuru odungudhu
eera kozha nadungudhu.

Chinna chinna poiyum pesura
jiivunu thaan soodum yethura

Nee paathaakaa thenna matta
paanjaakaa dhegam thatta
pasaangu venaaam sundharare.

Nee theyaadha naatu katta
theriyaama maatikitta
en raasi endrum manmadhaney..

Kandangi  Kandangi katti vandha ponnu
kandaale kirukethum kanja  vacha kannu.

Kannukulla erangi erangi
nenjukulla urangi urangi
en usura parikkira
enna seiyya nenaikkura.

Ambu vittu aala adikura
komba vittu vaala pidikkura

Thaali illaadha samsaaramey
thadayillaa minsaaramey
velaketha vaadi vennilave.

Endhan maarboda sandhanamey
maaraappu vaibogamey.
muthaada vaayaa munniravil.

Kandangi Kandangi katti vandha ponnu
kandaale kirukethum kanja vacha kannu
indha kannuku anji latchan podhaadhu..
indha nenjukku sothezhudhi theeraadhu.
thalli nillaiyaa ...

Kandangi Kandangi ...
kandaale kirukethum ..
kanja vacha kannu		 English Translation
I tried my best :)
A girl in Kandangi saree, with
heroin eyes that make people mad.
I'll give 5 Lac for that eyes.
I'll give my whole property for that chest.
give me a kiss...

A girl in Kandangi saree, with
heroin eyes that make people mad.
5 lac is not enough for me
whole property not suffice for my chest
just stand away ....

Your home at Thallaakulam
my home at theppa kulam
lets join together..

Like an elephant eating
sweet, let my desire
eat you ...

your deceiving beauty,
when we are alone
brain gets alarmed ..
pulse rate raises.

Showing your white hairs,
when you blink,
my soul shrinks,
my lung shakes,

telling small lies n
increasing the heat...

you look like coconut trees leaf
but so hard when you jump on me
don't act my love...

you're strong village girl
but I got you ..
coz my time is good .

A girl in Kandangi saree, with
eyes that make people mad.

you get into my eyes,
you got frozen in me.
by plucking my soul,
what're u trying to do ?

you're beating with a bow.
catching the tail leaving head.

You're my wife without ring
you're unstoppable power
come to light the lamp in my home.

you're sandal in my body
you're my life's celebration..
come to me ...

A girl in Kandangi saree, with
eyes that make people mad.
5 lac not enough for me
whole property not suffice for my chest
just stand away ....

Kandangi Kandangi
making mad on seeing..
eyes with heroin..
